default.headline: The OS That Dreams
default.subheadline: While you work, it indexes. While you sleep, it resolves. The first operating surface that turns downtime into committed value.
default.body: WorkspaceOS is your Exocortex—a second brain that runs locally on your machine. While you work, its Living LibraryBuilds a local, private Vector Index of your active context—PDFs, DOM elements, chat threads, and code. builds a structured graph of everything you view. When you step away, it enters a Dreaming StateSpins up sandboxed background processes to verify your citations, run exhaustive tests, and attempt shadow refactors., utilizing idle compute to resolve friction found during the day. By the time you return, your research is verified, your citations are linked, and your drafts are ready. All governed by an internal Agent ParliamentA deterministic governance layer that validates every autonomous output against your defined safety rules. to ensure rigor. Stop managing files. Start cultivating thoughts.

dev.headline: Your AI-powered Engineering Partner
dev.subheadline: The OS that refactors your code while you sleep. WorkspaceOS eliminates the coordination tax through Self-Governing Autonomy.
dev.body: WorkspaceOS is more than a copilot; it's a partner that works when you don't. Using Shadow GitSpins up invisible shadow branches to attempt risky refactors or documentation passes without touching your working tree., it utilizes system idle time to run exhaustive test suites, update stale documentation, and verify dependencies. It builds a **Hybrid Causal Graph** of your repo, allowing for Time Travel DebuggingScrub back through the causal history of your project to see exactly why a decision was made or a bug was introduced.. All governed by an internal **Agent Parliament** that debates and verifies every commit in a sandbox before it's ever proposed to you.

ai.headline: One OS for All Your AI
ai.subheadline: WorkspaceOS connects your AI agents into a unified intelligence layer that shares context across every tool.
ai.body: Your AI tools are islands—Claude doesn't know what Copilot wrote, ChatGPT can't see your Cursor sessions, and none of them remember yesterday's work. WorkspaceOS creates persistent memory across all AI interactions. When you debug with Copilot, your ChatGPT sessions know the context. When Claude writes documentation, it sees what you built in Cursor. Through screen-level pattern recognition, every AI agent shares the same understanding of your project. One conversation continues across all tools, with patterns cached permanently for zero-cost replay.

vision.headline: Computing That Learns Your Patterns
vision.subheadline: WorkspaceOS transforms repeated workflows into permanent computational primitives that execute at zero cost.
vision.body: Every workflow you repeat becomes a first-class object in WorkspaceOS. Like files and processes in traditional computing, your patterns become permanent, shareable, and composable. The first time you handle a payment error by checking logs, updating the dashboard, and notifying ops—that pattern is captured forever. Next time, it executes instantly at zero marginal cost. Through universal screen-level awareness, these patterns work across any application, any version, any platform. Your workflows become the new assembly language of knowledge work.
